Files Headings

appveyor.yml

http://www.appveyor.com/docs/appveyor-yml http://www.appveyor.com/docs/lang/nodejs-iojs

 
environment:
  matrix:

node.js

 
    - nodejs_version: "0.10"
    - nodejs_version: "0.12"

io.js

 
    - nodejs_version: "1"

install:
  - ps: Install-Product node $env:nodejs_version
  - npm install

test_script:
  - node --version
  - npm --version

power shell

 
  - ps: "npm test"

standard command line

 
  - cmd: npm test

build: off

version: "{build}"
